loading.title: Verifying Family Shield Access
loading.description: Please wait while we securely verify your access token...

verification.title: Additional Verification Required
verification.description: Please enter the verification code sent to your registered email.

noData.title: No Data Available
noData.description: Unable to load emergency access data. Please try again.

header.title: Family Shield - Guardian Access
header.authorizedAccess: Authorized access for {{guardianName}} to {{userName}}'s emergency information

accessInfo.description: This emergency access was activated on {{activationDate}} and will expire on {{expirationDate}}. All access is logged for security purposes.

survivorManual.title: Family Survivor's Manual
survivorManual.description: This comprehensive manual contains step-by-step instructions created by {{userName}} to guide the family through various situations. Generated on {{generatedDate}}.

documents.title: Available Documents
documents.noDocuments: No documents are available for your access level.
documents.accessErrorToast: Failed to access {{title}}. Please try again.

support.title: You're Not Alone
support.message: This information was carefully prepared by {{userName}} to support you during this difficult time. Remember to take things one step at a time and don't hesitate to reach out for help.
support.technicalSupport: If you need technical support with this system, please contact LegacyGuard support at support@legacyguard.com

toastMessages.invalidCode: Please enter a valid verification code
toastMessages.accessFailed: Failed to verify access token. Please try again or contact support.
